content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 tablespoon finely minced fresh parsley" )
( ing-5 "1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "400 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "200 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Drain escargots; rinse in cold water and drain again.
2) In a mixing bowl, combine the butter, garlic, green onion, parsley, pepper, nutmeg and wine.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the butter"@29:39 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "garlic"@41:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "green onion"@49:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "parsley"@62:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "pepper"@71:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "nutmeg"@79:85 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "wine"@90:94 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Place 1 teaspoon of butter mixture into each pastry shell.
5) Top each with 1 escargot, cover with another teaspoon of butter mixture and place mushroom cap on top.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Top"@3:6 / AC
		:gol ( "each"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "1 escargot"@17:27 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "cover"@29:34 / AC
		:ppt ( "another teaspoon of butter mixture"@40:74 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "place"@79:84 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "mushroom cap"@85:97 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "top"@101:104 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Arrange pastry shells on a 10x15 inch baking sheet.
7) Bake in a preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "a preheated oven"@11:27 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "8 to 10 minutes"@32:47 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until golden brown"@51:69 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
